text: Yigal Bashan (September 11, 1950 December 9, 2018) was an Israeli singer, songwriter, and actor. He was awarded the ACUM Prize for Life Achievement in 2016. Bashan was a member of the pop trio "Kmo Tzoanim" (Hebrew: "Like Gypsies") that appeared on the "Hopa Hey" Israeli children's television show. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Israeli singer-songwriters Category:Israeli movie actors Category:Singers from Tel Aviv Category:Actors from Tel Aviv Category:Jewish Israeli musicians
title: Yigal Bashan
